Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Welcome to University!

Name: LU Student
Text: Thank you!

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: We wish we could say you are in good hands, but these days we don't know.

Name: LU Student
Text: Oh no, what's going on?

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Banktania is invading our regions claiming they own it.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: We need your help in defending our land and defeating Banktania.

Name: LU Student
Text: How can I help?

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: I will guide you along the different levels.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: You will need to complete certain objectives before Banktania does.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: As you free more regions we will start to become stronger.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Eventually, when everyone is freed, we can fight off Banktania once and for all!

Name: LU Student
Text: I'm in.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Great.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: The first region we will go to is the Finance region.

Name: LU Student
Text: Lead the way.

Name: Evil Bankman
Text: HA! You brought students to defeat me?

Name: Evil Bankman
Text: You'll never have what it takes! We're too strong!

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: We'll see about that! These are our finest students!

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: They are Game Designers that will defeat Banktania once and for all!

Name: Evil Bankman
Text: That day will never come!

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Okay LU Student, you're up.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: I'll be guiding you throughout the level to help you.

Name: Professor Hewel
Text: Good luck!

Name: LU Student
Text: Thank you! I'll do my best.
